subject: Order #SSN5534 – Shipping Origin Enquiry
description_text:
Hi,

I’ve recently placed an order for a new set of peals with you (Order #SSN5534).

I just wanted to check whether this order will be dispatched from the UK, or if it will be shipped from another country. I noticed that your company address is based in the UK, so I wanted to confirm the shipping origin.

Thanks in advance for your help.

Jordan Morgan MIVR
Recovery Operations Manager
[cid:image001.png@01DC7995.FFF7F340]
[cid:image002.png@01DC7995.FFF7F340]

[cid:image003.png@01DC7995.FFF7F340]

Main: 01730 812162
DDI: 01730 888105
Mob: 07857 638922


Please keep all road workers safe.
Don't take your eyes off the road.
If you see a recovery truck, then
slow down and move over.

This email [and any attachments] is intended solely for the individual[s] to whom addressed. It may contain confidential and/or legally privileged information. Any statement or opinions therein are not necessarily those of Midhurst Engineering unless specifically stated. Any unauthorised use, disclosure or copying is prohibited. If you have received this email in error, please notify the sender and delete it from your system. Security and reliability of the e-mail and attachments are not guaranteed. You must take full responsibility for virus checking.

Midhurst Engineering & Motor Company Limited registered in England & Wales
Registered Office: Rumbolds Hill, Midhurst, West Sussex, GU29 9DD
Registration Number: 432447

conversations.body_text: Hi Jordan Morgan,  Since we haven’t opened a warehouse in the UK yet and only have one in Germany, orders will generally be shipped directly from our factory in China, which is also relatively fast.
